name: aftereffect
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an unpleasant effect that follows an event or accident, sometimes continuing for a long time or happening some time after it: Headaches are an aftereffect of this sort of accident.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a result of a condition or event: Headaches are an aftereffect of this sort of accident.
